stadium.name: The Glowstone Terrace
stadium.description: A massive, opulent stadium built on one of the city's main terraces, carved directly into the mountainside. The field is famously paved with polished Glowstone, and the stands overlook the bustling Confluence Market and the ongoing construction of the Guild's Skyport.

stats.pregame_ritual: Doing a terrible, clumsy dance to 'loosen the joints'.
Chugging a raw egg, shell and all.
Wearing their boots on the wrong feet during the warm-up.
Arm-wrestling the player who plays the same position on their team.
Speaking only in rhymes for the hour before the game.
Rubbing the Trollball on their armpits for 'grip'.
Wearing their boots on the wrong feet during the warm-up.
Going over the game plan drawn in the dirt with the team captain.
Covering their forearms in a sticky tree sap for 'grip'.
Eating a dandelion, stem and all.
Headbutting their own team's goal post (gently).

stadium.name: The Prismatic Pavilion
stadium.description: A massive, permanent, open-air fairground pavilion built on stilts over the Starlight Lagoon. The field is a chaotic mix of colorful stage-planks, constantly surrounded by the Prismatic Troupe's performers.

stats.pregame_ritual: Sticking a specific type of feather in their helmet's plume.
Jogging three laps around the perimeter of the field.
Getting a teammate to punch them in the shoulder, hard.
Tracing an invisible, complex sigil over their heart.
Performing a series of aggressive, theatrical poses.
Leading the team in a synchronized chant that slowly gets louder.
Staring at their reflection in a bucket of water until they feel 'ready'.
Telling a terrible joke to the Trollball to 'loosen it up'.
Staring intently at their gauntlets, as if for the first time.
Plucking a single hair from a teammate's beard for luck.
Trying to start a 'slow clap' with the audience before the game has begun.

preGame:
### üéôÔ∏è STEP RIGHT UP, SPORTS FANS! THE PLAYOFFS ARE PEAKING! üéôÔ∏è

Hello, you gorgeous ghouls and gridiron gladiators! It‚Äôs your favorite demon of the airwaves, Nok the Corrupter, coming to you live from the magnificent **Glowstone Terrace**! We are high in the World's Spine Mountains for Game 2 of this Winners' Bracket clash! The atmosphere is thinner than a hero‚Äôs excuses, and the **Market Day Crowd** is absolutely ravenous for some sanctioned slaughter! The **Confluence Captains** hold a 1-0 series lead, and if they win tonight, they‚Äôll send the Bizarres packing to the losers' bracket faster than a soul entering the Demon Prison! üèîÔ∏èüëä

I‚Äôve been watching the warm-ups, and let me tell you, the rituals are in full swing! **Ladew Evelina** just finished her third raw egg‚Äîshell and all‚Äîwhile **O'Conner Maighdlin** is currently refusing to speak unless it‚Äôs in a rhyming couplet. I hope 'goal' rhymes with 'shattering a skull' tonight! On the other side, the **Starlight Bazaar Bizarres** look a bit jittery. **Demp Chet** has been staring at his reflection in a bucket of water for twenty minutes, and **Milo Nelie** is tracing sigils over his heart like he‚Äôs trying to ward off the inevitable. It‚Äôs going to take more than magic to survive the **Mountain Wind** and the blinding **Glowstone Glare**! ü•ö‚ú®

The Guild of the Black Sky is out in force today, probably led by that strangely beautiful kissless virgin, Brennen Farno. I hope he brought his checkbook, because the Bizarres are looking to make them pay for that Game 1 blowout! Grab your drinks, folks‚Äîthe alcohol tolerance on this field is high enough to drain a tavern dry! Let‚Äôs get ready for some Trollball! üèüÔ∏èüçª
postGame:
### üèÜ THE CAPTAINS CLIMB TO VICTORY! SERIES SWEEP! üèÜ

Well, pull my horns and call me a goat, what a finish! The **Confluence Captains** have officially secured their spot in the next round, taking down the **Starlight Bazaar Bizarres** with a 2-1 victory and sweeping the series 2-0! It wasn't the blowout we saw in Game 1, but it was a masterclass in mountainside grit and Guild-sponsored brutality! The Bizarres fought like cornered rats, but they just couldn't overcome the sheer force of the Captains' defense! üèîÔ∏èüéâ

The game started with a frantic scramble in Center Field, with **Demp Chet** snatching up the head early. But folks, the Bizarres' momentum was shorter than a goblin‚Äôs temper! The Captains' defense, led by the incomparable **Caves Cestar**, was an absolute fortress. Cestar was reading passes like he was auditing the realm's taxes, snatching a wild pass from **Gagliano Tallbott** right out of the air! It was a beautiful display of theft that would make even Falric the thief jealous! üß§üíé

Then came the hits that make this game great! **Carnahan Laud**‚Äîwho I saw snacking on dandelions earlier‚Äîabsolutely pulverized **Aggri Cookie**! I haven't heard a crunch like that since Sir Tanos tried to use his head as a battering ram! The Cookie crumbled, and the Bizarres were already looking thin on the field. But the Captains weren't done! **Ladew Evelina**, fueled by those raw eggs, leveled **Pompei Hephzipa** with a hit that sent him straight to the healer. ü§ïüí•

Poor **Aggri Cookie** just couldn't catch a break! No sooner had he returned to the field than **Deach Sharlene** sent him right back to the sidelines with another bone-shattering tackle! It‚Äôs a wonder the Bizarres had anyone left to carry the ball! Before the half, **Caves Cestar** decided he hadn't done enough damage and took out **Bush Heiner** for good measure. The Bizarres were bleeding out, and the mountain wind was chilling their theatrical bones! üè•ü©π

Halftime allowed the healers to patch up the carnage, but the Captains didn't lose a beat. **Caves Cestar**‚Äîthe man of the match, surely‚Äîintercepted yet another pass, this time from **Quintessa Austine**. The Bizarres' offense was as disorganized as Chairman Riastrad on a vacation! The Captains smelled blood in the thin mountain air and they pounced! üê∫ü©∏

The breakthrough finally came from the 2-point zone! **Richia Pazit** found a gap in the chaotic Bizarre defense, squared up, and let it fly! **BOOM!** A 2-point shot that sent the Market Day Crowd into a total frenzy! The Captains took a 2-0 lead, and it looked like the Bizarres were finally headed for the lagoon! üèÄüî•

But wait! The Bizarres found a spark! **Pompei Hephzipa**, showing more life than a necromancer‚Äôs basement, managed to dodge the defense and charge into the End Zone for a spectacular dunk! It was 2-1, and for a moment, the Bizarres looked like they might actually pull off a miracle. Even Kython might have cracked a smile at that one! But hope is a dangerous thing in Osterra, especially when you‚Äôre facing the Guild! ü§°‚ú®

The Captains' defense tightened up like a locked vault. **Belding Chloe** and her armpit-rubbed ball were everywhere, stopping any further advance. The Bizarres tried to push, but they were running into a stone wall. It‚Äôs hard to score when you‚Äôre constantly being knocked into the Glowstone! üß±üõë

In the closing moments, **Ladew Evelina** put the final nail in the coffin by sending **Kristin Kronfeld** to the healer. The Captains stood tall, the final whistle blew, and the Bizarres were officially relegated to the losers' bracket! The Guild of the Black Sky must be laughing all the way to the bank, while the Bizarres are left to tell their terrible jokes to an empty stadium. üèÜüëè

What a series! The Captains move forward with momentum that could level a mountain, while the Bizarres have to find a way to rebuild their shattered pride. I‚Äôm Nok the Corrupter, and I‚Äôm going to go find where Cyfnerth the Butcher keeps the celebratory snacks! Stay brutal, Osterra! üíÄüî•üéôÔ∏è
